attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the government to scrap the idea of road pricing forthwith on the grounds that:-
1    All motorised road users already pay enormous amounts into the transport fund through road tax and VAT on fuel.
2    The cost of the infrastructure and beaurocracy to collect the new tax will be enormous.
3    It acts as a spy in the cab of your vehicle.
4    The present road taxation through 
the tax disc and VAT on fuel already means the road user is already paying for road use, including congestion and pollution.
5    More taxation on roads will lead to rising inflation as road transport costs 
will inevitably increase.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call for action, not your name. However, there are already several petitions on this issue already.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
